# Oscar Mañas

> Research Scientist at Meta Superintelligence Labs (Media Generation team). 
> Multimodal AI researcher specializing in vision-language generative models — 
> image, video, and text generation and understanding.

## Expertise
- Multimodal generative models (image, video, text)
- Vision-language understanding and generation
- Multimodal LLMs, diffusion models, autoregressive generation
- Contrastive learning, image-text alignment

## Current Role
Research Scientist, Meta Superintelligence Labs — Media Generation team, Zürich

## Education
PhD, Mila / Université de Montréal (advisor: Aishwarya Agrawal)
M.Sc. Computer Vision, Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona
B.Sc. Computer Science, Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya
